Desc.entry: A hip hop dance crew based in Sheffield. Dancers are from a variety of ages and dance backgrounds making them diverse in skill and style. The crew was established so that talented dancers from all over Sheffield could experience great dance opportunities and enhance their skills and style. Aims to be involved in dance competitions and performance opportunities so that members grow as dancers. A shared passion for dance brings the crew together with a high level of creativity and commitment. Welcomes new dancers offering the opportunity to learn, create and perform. DDC are available for hire as dancers for events and can provide dance classes and workshops for the community. Also available as choreographers for performances or projects. Please see website for further details.
